projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: Portfolio website showcasing my skills and projects
projects.longDescription: My personal portfolio, built with React, Framer Motion and Vite for fast development. CI/CD is handled via Vercel, as with most of my other projects.

projects.name: Easy Track
projects.longDescription: Deployed full-stack mobile app for tracking user weight. Designed as a production-ready product with a clean, layered architecture and proper separation of concerns, making it easy to scale and maintain. Google OAuth2 integration is fully implemented and tested, but currently disabled due to issues with Google Cloud Console configuration.

projects.name: PyBet
projects.longDescription: PyBet is a group project utilizing Vue.js frontend and Django backend. It scrapes current football odds from Polish bookmaker websites and uses machine learning to identify profitable ones. I was responsible for leading the backend development team and writing unit tests.

projects.name: GetProxy
projects.longDescription: Simple proxy that runs inside an iframe. Developed to bypass iframe navigation restrictions in modern browsers. Built with Spring Boot and a minimalistic React frontend. Backend is currently offline.

projects.name: Harmonic Motion Simulator
projects.longDescription: Simple front-end simulation of harmonic motion, connected to a Node.js backend. The backend allows for account creation, login, and settings storage. User sessions are maintained using cookies. Backend is currently offline.

projects.name: Mountain Trails Database
projects.longDescription: This project is an MVC application built with Spring Boot. Although the UI is basic, the project helped me solidify my understanding of the MVC pattern and database connectivity in Spring. It uses Java, Spring Boot, Thymeleaf, and PostgreSQL. Backend is currently offline.

projects.name: OCR Raider
projects.description: Basic OCR application with a custom algorithm
projects.longDescription: OCR Raider is a full-stack project created as a team effort. It features a custom text recognition algorithm implemented in Python. Backend is currently offline.
